item.title: About
item.dc:creator: fatimahalmahdoud
item.content:encoded: This is an example of a page. Unlike posts, which are displayed on your blog’s front page in the order they’re published, pages are better suited for more timeless content that you want to be easily accessible, like your About or Contact information. Click the Edit link to make changes to this page or add another page.

item.content:encoded:
IOT models With Ai

Young programmers, developers, creators and whose interested in ROBOTS age +4-16 years old

IOT models with 3d or 2d Ai challenges in their work, ranging from technical issues to broader organizational and societal concerns. Here are some common issues that programmers and developers , IoT, Ai, ML, Drones,

Create IOT Module

Young programmers, developers, creators and whose interested in ROBOTS age +4-16 years old

An IoT (Internet of Things) project Open source programming tool , platform refers to a comprehensive environment or framework that facilitates the development, and management of IoT applications. provide tools, services, and resources to help the developers create and implement the IoT solutions

How it's Works?

  • Collaborate with fellow architects.
  • Showcase your projects.
  • Create an account .
  • Get a job, job offer , or project offer .
  • Use cryptocurrency or currency exchange(Points) .
  • Get paied , Send gift , or buy currency (Points) .
  • Free Course , paied course ,or Exechang currency .
  • Join workshop , offer Workshop , spishal needs workshop .
  • Create project , offer project , or share project .
  • Create voice program Ai or voice code Iot.

User Benefit Of Using Google IOT

  • Flexibility .
  • You can easily get your dream course.
  • easy to use .
  • improve your skills.
  • Cost Savings.
  • Data-Driven Decision-Making.
  • Scalability :IoT solutions are often scalable, allowing users to easily expand or adapt their systems to accommodate growth or changes in requirements.
  • Predictive Maintenance :By analyzing data from IoT devices, users can predict when equipment or systems may need maintenance, reducing downtime and preventing unexpected failures.
  • Environmental Impact:
  • IoT products can contribute to sustainability efforts by optimizing resource usage, reducing energy consumption, and enabling eco-friendly practices.

AI Technology with the Internet of Things IOT

  • free and exchange cost programs (Google Point).
  • Accept and offer a digital currency (Google Point) for our customer.
  • Anyone whose age +4-16 are welcome to join also we have educational toys , Challenge Timer .
  • We offer online jobs for IT professional and anyone whose interested to work , teach ,offer courses or workshops .

problems we solve

The issues that face the programmers and developers .

Find the right solution for the creators and developers.

Increase the jobs in our city using our platform .

Debugging the Errors of coding

Find the solution from different direction.

Test the skills experience in our platform.

Key Differentiators

  • free and exchange cost programs (Google Point).

has everything you need to become a proficient coder of IOT

item.title: Electronics Store
item.dc:creator: fatimahalmahdoud
item.content:encoded:
Electronics 

Electronics is a scientific and engineering discipline that studies and applies the principles of physics to design, create, and operate devices that manipulate electrons and other electrically charged particles. Electronics is a subfield of electrical engineering, but it differs from it in that it focuses on using active devices such as transistors, diodes, and integrated circuits to control and amplify the flow of electric current and to convert it from one form to another, such as from alternating current (AC) to direct current (DC) or from analog to digital. Electronics also encompasses the fields of microelectronics, nanoelectronics, optoelectronics, and quantum electronics, which deal with the fabrication and application of electronic devices at microscopic, optical, and quantum scales.

We believe in the power of technology to transform lives and enrich experiences. Whether you're a tech enthusiast, a professional in need of cutting-edge tools, or a family looking to upgrade your home appliances, we have everything you need to stay connected, productive, and entertained.

Explore Our Extensive Range of Products:

  • Computers and Laptops: From sleek ultrabooks to powerful gaming rigs, we offer a diverse selection of computers and laptops to suit every need and budget.
  • Smartphones and Tablets: Stay connected on the go with the latest smartphones and tablets from top brands, packed with innovative features and stunning designs.
  • Home Appliances: Make your life easier and more efficient with our range of home appliances, including refrigerators, washing machines, air conditioners, and more.
  • Audio and Visual Equipment: Immerse yourself in high-quality sound and visuals with our collection of headphones, speakers, TVs, and home theater systems.
  • Accessories and Gadgets: Enhance your devices with our wide range of accessories, including cases, chargers, cables, and other essential gadgets.

Why Choose Our store ?

  1. Quality and Reliability: We source our products from trusted brands and manufacturers known for their quality and reliability, ensuring that you get the best value for your money.
  2. Expert Advice: Our knowledgeable team of experts is here to help you find the perfect products to meet your needs, providing personalized recommendations and guidance every step of the way.
  3. Convenience: Shop with ease and convenience from the comfort of your home or visit our store to experience our products firsthand. With fast shipping and flexible payment options, getting your hands on the latest tech has never been easier.
  4. Customer Satisfaction: Your satisfaction is our top priority. We strive to deliver exceptional customer service, from pre-sales inquiries to after-sales support, to ensure that your shopping experience with us is nothing short of excellent.

Computers and Laptops: This category includes desktop computers, laptops, notebooks, and accessories such as keyboards, mice, monitors, and docking stations.$39.00 USD

Smartphones and Tablets: Smartphones, tablets, phablets, and their accessories like cases, screen protectors, chargers, and cables fall under this category.$39.00 USD

Home Appliances: This category encompasses various household appliances such as refrigerators, washing machines, dryers, dishwashers, ovens, microwaves, air purifiers, and vacuum cleaners.$39.00 USD

Audio and Visual Equipment: This category includes items like headphones, earphones, speakers, soundbars, home theater systems, televisions (LED, OLED, QLED), projectors, and media players.$39.00 USD

Drone Training and Education:

  • Training Courses: Online or in-person training courses and workshops provide guidance on drone operation, safety, regulations, and best practices.
  • Instructional Books and Guides: Books and guides cover various aspects of drone piloting, photography, videography, and aerial mapping.       $39.00 USD

Parrot statue

$39.00 USD

item.title: About us
item.dc:creator: fatimahalmahdoud
item.content:encoded:
What is Google IOT Kids

Our vision

Google IOT A Serveices for kids A journey into the world of programming! Whether you're a complete beginner or looking to expand your coding skills ,Google Iot is here to guide you every step of the way.
Our interactive software is designed to make learning programming enjoyable, accessible, and effective for learners of age 4-16.

Our vision

With Google IOT .
Dive into a wide range of programming languages, including Ai and IOT. From basic syntax to advanced algorithms, Google iot has everything you need to become a proficient coder of IOT.
interactive lessons and tutorials Also points that encourage active participation and experiential learning. Dive into coding challenges, debug code snippets, and experiment with live coding environments to reinforce your understanding.

“

Job offers for our students , to offer their projects and support their product Also we offer Google IOT points .
Whether you're dreaming of building your own software . Google IOT is your gateway to programming proficiency. Join us and start your coding

”

item.dc:creator: fatimahalmahdoud
item.content:encoded:
• Educational games, puzzles, quizzes, and interactive activities.
  • Filter options: Allow children to filter games by age, subject, or skill level to find activities that match their interests and abilities.
  • Game descriptions: Brief descriptions or previews of each game to help children decide which ones to play.

item.title: Learning Resources
item.dc:creator: fatimahalmahdoud
item.content:encoded:
• Educational content: Articles, videos, tutorials, and other resources to help children learn about various subjects, such as science, math, language arts, and history.
  • Printable worksheets: Downloadable worksheets and activity sheets that children can print out and complete offline.
  • Online courses: Interactive courses or lessons on specific topics, presented in a fun and engaging format.

Drone Training and Education:

  • Training Courses: Online or in-person training courses and workshops provide guidance on drone operation, safety, regulations, and best practices.
  • Instructional Books and Guides: Books and guides cover various aspects of drone piloting, photography, videography, and aerial mapping.
  • Drone Software and Apps:
  • Flight Planning Software: Flight planning apps allow drone pilots to plan and execute flights, capture aerial imagery, and create maps and 3D models.

Motors and ESCs (Electronic Speed Controllers): Motors and ESCs are essential components for drone propulsion and control, and replacements may be required in case of damage or malfunction.

Smart Agriculture:

  • Soil Moisture Monitoring System: Deploy sensors in agricultural fields to measure soil moisture levels and automate irrigation systems, optimizing water usage and crop yield.
  • Livestock Monitoring: Develop wearable trackers for livestock animals to monitor their health, location, and behavior, enabling farmers to detect issues early and improve herd management.

Healthcare:

  • Remote Health Monitoring: Develop wearable devices or sensors that monitor vital signs such as heart rate, blood pressure, and temperature, transmitting data to healthcare providers for remote monitoring.
  • Medication Adherence System: Build a system that reminds patients to take their medications on time and monitors adherence, sending alerts to caregivers or healthcare professionals if doses are missed.
